item.title: Mike Huckabee selected for ambassador to Israel
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has announced that he will nominate former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee to be the U.S. ambassador to Israel.

item.title: Trump chooses Mike Waltz for national security adviser
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced Tuesday that Rep. Mike Waltz will be his national security adviser in the new administration.
